global.title: Toan cau
global.description: Theo WHO, tinh trang khang khang sinh dang gia tang va nguy hiem khong kem dai dich COVID-19.
global.deaths: Moi nam, khoang 700.000 nguoi tren the gioi tu vong vi khang khang sinh. Con so nay co the tang len 10 trieu nguoi vao nam 2050 ~ chi mot con ho hay mot vet cat tren da cung co the gay tu vong.

issues.engagement: Su tham gia thap vao phong benh

about.title: Ve chung toi
about.founded: MediFind duoc thanh lap boi nhom sinh vien tu Truong Dai hoc Bach Khoa TP.HCM va Truong Dai hoc Kinh te TP.HCM (UEH)
about.description: MediFind la ung dung su dung cong nghe tri tue nhan tao de nhan dien thuoc tu hinh anh hoac van ban don thuoc. Ung dung cung cap huong dan su dung thuoc an toan va loi khuyen phu hop voi tinh trang suc khoe cua tung nguoi.
about.features: Ung dung con co cac tinh nang huu ich nhu nhac uong thuoc, chat hoi dap, va ban do tim nha thuoc gan nhat, giup viec su dung ung dung de dang hon cho moi nguoi.
about.first_in_vietnam: MediFind la ung dung dau tien tai Viet Nam cho phep nguoi dung nhan dien don thuoc qua hinh anh va van ban so.

pharma.title: Nha san xuat duoc pham

Bien moi hop thuoc thanh kenh giao duc uy tin
Truy cap phan tich du lieu an danh co gia tri

architecture.description: Kien truc trung tam cua MediFind dua tren hai giai doan: Nhan dang ky tu quang hoc (OCR) va Xu ly ngon ngu tu nhien (NLP). Bang cach ket hop VietOCR va spaCy, sau qua trinh tinh chinh can than, chung toi da dat duoc do chinh xac cao trong viec xac dinh ten thuoc va khang sinh.
